Event: 24th Knesset Opens and Netanyahu Coalition Mandate
Description: The 24th Knesset opened. President Reuven Rivlin gave Netanyahu a 28-day mandate to form a new government coalition after the March 2021 elections. Negotiations began with various parties.

Israeli police entered Al-Aqsa Mosque compound on the first night of Ramadan and disconnected the loudspeaker broadcasting the muezzin's call to prayer. This incident sparked significant controversy and inflamed tensions during Ramadan.
